article.description: Ritchart, Hawkins lead UC Davis past N Colorado 73-63
article.headline: Ritchart, Hawkins lead UC Davis past N Colorado 73-63
article.linkText: Ritchart, Hawkins lead UC Davis past N Colorado 73-63
article.story: GREELEY, Colo. -- Josh Ritchart came off the bench to score 20 points and Corey Hawkins added 18 to lead UC Davis to a 73-63 win over Northern Colorado on Monday. Tyler Les and Josh Fox scored 11 points apiece for the Aggies (9-1), who shot 51 percent from the field to match the best start in school history. Ritchart and Hawkins both had seven rebounds as Davis outrebounded the Bears 41-31. Northern Colorado (5-6) was led by Jordan Wilson with 15 points. Tevin Svihovec had 14 as the Bears shot 38 percent. Davis had a quick 10-point lead but the Bears clawed back to trail 30-29 at the half. Cameron Michael hit a 3-pointer to tie the game at 32 in the first minute of the second half and Dominique Lee had a layup at 17:14 for UNC's only lead, which lasted 30 seconds.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
